attributes.action: Ignore any request for a second EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: Where does it all end? Should we have another referendum to decide if we should have another EU referendum! Do we simply keep on having another referendum until the Remain campaign win? They have had their chance to vote and the people have spoken to leave.
attributes.background: Call upon HM Government to ignore any public request for another EU referendum based upon turnout or percentage of winning votes
